Ring_of_Fire.help: You immobilize your foe in a ring of fire, causing fire damage over time. Affected targets cannot move and are unable to fly. Recharge: Fast
Ring_of_Fire.targetHelp: You are suffering fire damage over time and are immobilized.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You Immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

messages.attackerHit: You Immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

Char.help: You surround your target with charred soot and ash, choking them. This momentarily incapacitates them, holding them in place. The target also suffers fire damage over time due to the smoldering debris. Recharge: Moderate
Char.targetHelp: You are suffering fire damage over time and are held.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

messages.attackerHit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

Cinders.help: You create a whirling field of cinders around yourself, causing nearby targets to choke. This causes all affected targets to become incapacitated and held in place. Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

messages.attackerHit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

Bonfire.help: You can create a bonfire at the feet of a distant target. This causes any foes who try to pass through it to suffer fire damage and be knocked back. Recharge: Slow

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} creates a raging {PowerName} at your location.

Fire_Imps.help: You create 3 small Imps out of pure flame. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only possess the most basic instincts and cannot be controlled. Recharge: Slow

Power_Bolt.help: You rapidly hurl a bolt of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked down. Recharge: Fast
Power_Bolt.shortHelp: Ranged, High DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Power_Blast.help: You launch a more powerful blast of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked back. Recharge: Fast
Power_Blast.shortHelp: Ranged, Superior DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Power_Burst.help: You launch a very powerful burst of energy at a single foe, causing energy and smashing damage. There is a chance that the target will also be knocked back. Recharge: Slow
Power_Burst.shortHelp: Ranged (Close), Extreme DMG (Energy/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)
